basic.description: The elements of the regional development process and regional policies. Principal theories and methods of regional analysis. Assessment of strategies of regional development and the use of policy instruments in regional development programs in North America and western Europe.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Regional Development Theory and Policy

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of GPHY228 and (GPHY227 or GPHY247 or 3.0 units in DEVS at the 200-level or above), or permission of the Department.
